message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $95 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm willing to sell it to you for $105.
I understand that you're still a bit higher than my initial offer, but I'm willing to compromise. I'll meet you at $98. I think that's a fair price for both of us.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I'm getting close, but I still think we can find a better price. I'm willing to meet you at $102. Can you consider that?
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob! I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to sell it to you for $115.
I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'll meet you at $108. This is my final offer.

I understand that you're getting frustrated, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell it to you for $108. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $112.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $110. This is my final offer. I'm willing to walk away if you're not willing to meet me at this price.
